answers.answer: Odor in the urine usually means some type of infection. Did you Dr. test you for a UTI? Is your urine darker then usual?

Hello,Odor in urine can be due to diet like coffee or asparagus, infection like bladder or urinary tract, dehydration or diabetes. You should visit your doctor for a urine examination and evaluation to find out the exact cause and treatment for the foul smell.I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: hiwhen i go to the bathroom my urine oder is very bad. i went to the docter she told me evreything is ok. i went to menopause 2 years ago. and also i had  a reflax surgery of kidney  when i was eleven yers old. i am 45 years old.
